main.description: Record containing a bookmarked item, or 'clip'.

createdAt.description: Client-declared timestamp when the bookmark is created

description.description: A description of the bookmark's content. This should be ripped from the URL metadata and be static for all records using the URL.

languages.description: Indicates human language of the given URL

notes.description: User-written notes for the bookmark. Public and personal.

tags.description: An array of tags. A format of solely alphanumeric characters and dashes should be used.

title.description: The title of the bookmark. If left empty, reuse the URL.

unlisted.description: Whether the bookmark can be used for feed indexing and aggregation

unread.description: Whether the bookmark has been read by the user

url.description: The URL of the bookmark. Cannot be left empty or be modified after creation.
